title: Meditation, Visualization and Mind Power - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/13/17
itunes:title: Meditation, Visualization and Mind Power - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/13/17
description:
George Noory and guest Mitch Horowitz discuss using mind power and visualization to improve your life and self image, as well as the predictions of famed psychic Edgar Cayce.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
